entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning this evening and ending overnight then 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023
